title: CHES
content:
I've seen this font so many times, but can't remember the name. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022085402im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ches_5991.gif)
author: russ_mcmullin

comments.content: Fenice is the font I was thinking of, but my sample doesn't match anything I've found for sale. It looks like it is made from one of the lighter weights, with a stroke added, and squashed vertically.
